publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3039 Richard Lochhead: Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits-That the Parliament notes the decision by Her Majesty's Government to increase tax on North Sea oil and gas profits by 10% but believes that any provision to this effect should not be introduced until a full economic assessment has been conducted of the impact of any changes on current and future employment and exploration related to North Sea activities.
S1M-3039 Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits (lodged on 26 April 2002) Irene McGugan*, Colin Campbell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Stewart Stevenson*, Tricia Marwick*, Bruce Crawford*
S1M-3039 Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits (lodged on 26 April 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Brian Adam*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-3039 Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits (lodged on 26 April 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3039 Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits (lodged on 26 April 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3039 Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits (lodged on 26 April 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-3039 Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits (lodged on 26 April 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3039 Taxation on Oil and Gas Profits (lodged on 26 April 2002) Fergus Ewing*
